Package items

Class Booster

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.han.ica.oopg.objects.GameObject
      • nl.han.ica.oopg.objects.SpriteObject
        • items.Item
          • items.Booster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    nl.han.ica.oopg.userinput.IKeyInput, nl.han.ica.oopg.userinput.IMouseInput, processing.core.PConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FlashBomb, SpeedBoost
    public abstract class Booster
extends Item
    This is the super-class of all boosters. When a booster is picked up by the player it is passed to a BoosterEffect and then removed from game. This does not destroy the Booster object, because the BoosterEffect still has a reference. The BoosterEffect is then added to the list kept by Game. The methods startEffect() and endEffect() are called from Game.

               nl.han.ica.oopg.objects.Sprite sprite,
               double effectDuration,
               BoosterId typeId)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        effectDuration - The number of seconds the effect of this booster should last.
        game - The game object to add the BoosterEffect to.
        sprite - The sprite for this Booster.
        typeId - The BoosterId for this Booster.

    • Method Detail

      • pickUp

        public void pickUp​(Player player)
        This adds an effect to boostereffect list in Game This is called by Player when picked up. The Item class removes this Booster from the game after this runs.
        Specified by:
        pickUp in class Item
        Parameters:
        player - The player object
